title: El Camino spoilers: all the Breaking Bad callbacks and easter eggs you may have missed
text:
Like a mobile meth lab primed to overheat, the new Breaking Bad sequel movie, El Camino, is bursting with call-backs, winks and conspicuous tips of its black pork pie hat.

The most obvious nod comes via a parade of cameos as Jesse Pinkman’s attempt to flee the flaming crucible of Walter White’s demise forces him to confront his past. He reunites with old sidekicks Badger and Skinny Peter. And he turns to the same fixer who helped Saul Goodman escape to Nebraska and start over as a Cinnabon drone.

However – and this is where the spoilers really start – the biggest walks-ons are right at the end. Walter White (Bryan Cranston) saunters back into Jesse’s life – and ours – as Pinkman reflects on...
description: Like a mobile meth lab primed to overheat, the new Breaking Bad sequel movie, El Camino, is bursting with call-backs, winks and conspicuous tips of its black pork pie hat.
